description.full: Prepare for the fight of your life!  Enter the world of ULTIMATE Mortal Kombat 3 and discover 22 playable characters, classic fatalities, tons of environments, and multiplayer Kombat Mode as you fight to defeat Shao Kahn!
description.short: Prepare for the fight of your life!  Enter the world of ULTIMATE Mortal Kombat 3 and discover 22 playable characters, classic fatalities, tons of environments, and multiplayer Kombat Mode as you fight to defeat Shao Kahn!
